column3: Cardiff School of Computer Science and Informatics
column5: Why study this courseDesigned for graduates who want to move into computing from another discipline, this one year programme provides you with a broad technical knowledge and a sound business context for managing IT systems.Designed for graduates who want to move into computing from another discipline, the MSc Computing and IT Management provides you with a broad technical knowledge and a sound business context for managing IT systems.
column9: 1 year full time, 3 years part time
